nodes.text: Moracen was a female Human Jedi Padawan who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

A Force-sensitive Human, Moracen was trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order, serving as the Padawan of Jedi Master Silvarte. In the wake of the Great Galactic War and the resurgence of the Sith Empire, Moracen studied on the ancestral Jedi homeworld Tython with the rest of the Order during the Cold War, residing at the Temple there. During her training, Moracen fell in love with fellow apprentice, Spanios, as both were regularly assigned to work with each other. Developing a strong bond with each other, they discovered a rare lightsaber crystal amidst the ruins of the ancient fortress city of Kaleth. Despite their attempts at discretion, the pairs' masters became suspicious of their activities and sent another Padawan to discover whether the two apprentices were indeed romantically involved.

When dealing with Moracen and Spanios, Jedi Knight and Consular players have three options. They can reveal the romantic relationship to Moracen and Spanios' relationship to their Masters for light side points, lie and keep it hidden for dark side points, or lie for dark side points, and later convince Spanios to break off the relationship with Moracen for light side points.
